title: I have a 502 score in the NEET. What should I do? Which course is good other than MBBS? - Quora
tags: Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery Degrees

response.answer_text: If you have got 502 i hope you also have the ability to score 600+ with some more dedications. Other options are BAMS, homeopathy, private mbbs, gnm nursing. Free advice- if you go to some other medical line than of mbbs youll regret and after may be 2 years youll again try for neet.(this happend to a lot of guys)
In medical field, BDS, PHARMACY,etc. have lots of graduates already than the requirements. Only MBBS is in shortage.
